chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 mini has the above problem:
Hello,
I received a phone without CE markings, which was noticed during a routine inspection. According to applicable law, these products cannot be sold in Europe, as confirmed by my lawyer (see attachment).
I urgently request the sending of CE-certified device or refund of the paid amount. I will send you the non-European model and request an return shipping label here.
I kindly ask to disregard any explanations about how the CE mark can be recognized in the system, as it is explicitly stated that the mark must be present on the device/packaging.
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

The customer received the wrong model. 

The device is a Version without CE-Marking that also is not Wallet-Function capable. 

This issue falls under the legal guarantee of conformity, so the customer is entitled to an exchange or refund outside the cancellation period.  

This customer would like an exchange for an EU Model or a refund.  

For the return, can you please confirm that in the next 24 hours you’ll have the right item available in stock to handle the exchange? 

You’ll have 3 business days to exchange the item after receiving the package.  

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!

Have a nice day.

Best regards,
Astrid Back Market customer Care

Hello Pascal,

You can find your return label attached to this message. Chronopost will process your return. Simply drop off your package at a nearby drop-off location. You can find a list of locations here: 

Before you prepare your return:
1. Follow the instructions on how to return an item at: https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/360014698640-Returns-and-refunds-instructions
2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product.
3. Remove any existing protective film or wrapper.
4. Pack your product and its accessories according to the tips below.

How to pack your product:
• The box should be sturdy and stable, and your product should be placed inside so it can't move during transit.
• Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a spare label inside to identify your package in case the original label is lost or damaged).
• Take photos of the package from both the inside and outside before shipping. This will protect you in case your product is damaged during transit.

Your return is now ready for pickup! We'll let you know when it arrives at our facility.

Best regards,
Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We will check if we have sufficient stock for an exchange. In the meantime, we await the reception of the parcel, thank you.

Regards,
YR

Dear ecomobile,

The customer wants a refund.

Tracking: Chronopost XJ335965295JF

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!

Have a nice day.

Best regards,
Astrid Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We will await for the arrival of the package. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile,

The customer wants a refund.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!

Have a nice day.

Best regards,
Astrid Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare, 

Thank you. We are still processing the device. Will update you soon once we finish checking the device. Thank you.

Regards, 
KW

Dear ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.

We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. 

Please use the “Report a Problem” button at the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 

https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!

Have a nice day.

Best regards,
Astrid Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the reminder.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

You have received the product for refund on 10/06/2024. The deadline for the refund is 48 hours.
As you have not complied with this, we will refund the purchase price to the customer. Thank you for your understanding.


Regards,
Ermelinda from the Back Care Team
